questions.question: Do you face Shortness of breath?
Do you face Fluttering in the chest?
Do you face Racing heartbeat (tachycardia)?
Do you face Slow heartbeat (bradycardia)?
Are you irregular on exercise/ physically inactive?
Do you smoke?
Do you have secound hand smoke exposure?
Do you consume much oily food?
Are you an alcohol addict?
Do you eat much red meat?
Do you have Swelling of the hands, ankles or feet?
Do you have Dry or persistent cough?
Do you have Skin rashes or unusual spots?
Do you have Pale gray or blue skin or lips (cyanosis)?
Do you suffer from Obesity?
Have previous records of High blood pressure?
Have previous records of Cholesterol?
Have previous records of Diabeties?
Do you faint now and then (syncope)?
Anyone in your family history have heart problems?
